casebody.data:
HAYES FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP et al.
v.
TOWN OF GLASTONBURY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Richard P. Weinstein, in support of the petition.

Matthew Ranetti and Andrea L. Gomes, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 585, 142 A.3d 408 (2016), is denied.
